docs.text: cheomseongdae Let's express the operating principles of Apache Spark interestingly and visually. I hope the process is more fun than the result. pypi https://pypi.org/project/cheomseongdae install pip install cheomseongdae use >>> cheomseongdae-ping pong >>> cheomseongdae-ping 10 ppppppppppong

docs.text: Let's express the operating principles of Apache Spark interestingly and visually. I hope the process is more fun than the result.

docs.text: Cheomseongdae package is ... cheomseongdae cheomseongdae Cheomseongdae 첨성대 ping ( n = 1 ) staticmethod ping & pong To use: >>> Cheomseongdae.ping() pong Parameters: Name Type Description Default n 1 Returns: Type Description str Source code in cheomseongdae/cheomseongdae.py @staticmethod def ping ( n = 1 ) -> str : """ping & pong To use: >>> Cheomseongdae.ping() pong Args: n: Returns: """ return f " { 'p' * n } ong"
